COMMENT_TX: $Astros manager Phil Garner told HP umpire Phil Cuzzi that the dugout phone to the bullpen was not working; a player was sent to check the status of the pitchers warming up; Garner returned to the bench and then returned to the field to remove Roy Oswalt; Braves manager Bobby Cox protested the game, since he claimed this was Garner's second trip to the mound during the same batter's time at HP
$John Thomson left with strained muscle in his side
$the ball caromed off the scoreboard 2/3 back to the infield
$the ball was headed for short RF but struck the roof and landed behind the mound
$the Astros win their first post-season series after 43 years

$John Thomson left with strained muscle in his side

$the ball was headed for short RF but struck the roof and landed behind the mound
